Grid3DStyle
INotifyPropertyChanged
public
ChartSharp.​Grid3DStyle

Defines the rendering style of a grid in a SurfaceChart. It is a member of Chart3DStyle.

Functions
GridStyle

Initializes all properties to their default values.

Properties
ForegroundXY
public Color ForegroundXY { get; set }

The foreground color of the grid in the XY-Plane. This is the color of the lines of the grid.

Default Value

Colors.Black

ForegroundXZ
public Color ForegroundXZ { get; set }

The foreground color of the grid in the XZ-Plane. This is the color of the lines of the grid.

Default Value

Colors.Black

ForegroundYZ
public Color ForegroundYZ { get; set }

The foreground color of the grid in the YZ-Plane. This is the color of the lines of the grid.

Default Value

Colors.Black

IntervalX
public double IntervalX { get; set }

This interval determines how often lines are drawn in the X-Direction.  If set to 0, SurfaceChart will throw an ArgumentException.

Default Value

1

IntervalY
public double IntervalY { get; set }

This interval determines how often lines are drawn in the Y-Direction.  If set to 0, SurfaceChart will throw an ArgumentException.

Default Value

1

IntervalZ
public double IntervalZ { get; set }

This interval determines how often lines are drawn in the Z-Direction.  If set to 0, SurfaceChart will throw an ArgumentException.

Default Value

1

IsVisible
public bool IsVisible { get; set }

If true, the grid will be rendered. Otherwise it is not visible

Default Value

true

IsXYVisible
public bool IsXYVisible { get; set }

If true, the grid in the XY-Plane will be rendered. Otherwise it is not visible

Default Value

true

IsXZVisible
public bool IsXZVisible { get; set }

If true, the grid in the XZ-Plane will be rendered. Otherwise it is not visible

Default Value

true

IsYZVisible
public bool IsYZVisible { get; set }

If true, the grid in the YZ-Plane will be rendered. Otherwise it is not visible

Default Value

true

Thickness
public double Thickness { get; set }

Specifies the thickness of lines of the grid.

Default Value

0.1
